text:
Threatened Species Protection Order 2019

I make the following order under section 13(5) of the Threatened Species Act 1995 .

9 May 2019

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Environment

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Threatened Species Protection Order 2019 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Act
    In this order, the Threatened Species Protection Act 1995 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Threatened Species Protection Act 1995 .

5.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Threatened Species Protection Act 1995 .

6.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Threatened Species Protection Act 1995 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 5 June 2019

This order is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
